raw_text: This is in line with earlier work on consistent estimation for similar models (Zollmann and Sima? an, 2006), and agrees with the most up-to-date work that em ploys Bayesian priors over the estimates (Zhang et al., 2008)
clean_text: This is in line with earlier work on consistent estimation for similar models (Zollmann and Sima? an, 2006), and agrees with the most up-to-date work that employs Bayesian priors over the estimates (Zhang et al., 2008).

raw_text: Also most up-to-date, (Zhang et al, 2008) report on a multi-stage model, without a latent segmentation variable, but with a strong prior preferring sparse estimates embedded ina Variational Bayes (VB) estimator and concentrating the efforts on pruning both the space of phrase pairs and the space of (ITG) analyses
clean_text: Also most up-to-date, (Zhang et al, 2008) report on a multi-stage model, without a latent segmentation variable, but with a strong prior preferring sparse estimates embedded in a Variational Bayes (VB) estimator and concentrating the efforts on pruning both the space of phrase pairs and the space of (ITG) analyses.
